parameter.name: source_currency_dropdown_id
parameter.description: the dropdown component id of the source currency

parameter.name: source_currency_value
parameter.description: the value of the source currency option to select

parameter.name: target_currency_dropdown_id
parameter.description: the dropdown component id of the target currency

parameter.name: target_currency_value
parameter.description: the value of the target currency option to select

parameter.name: amount_input_box_id
parameter.description: the input box component id for the amount

parameter.name: amount_value
parameter.description: the amount of source currency to enter

parameter.name: result_box_id
parameter.description: the conversion result display box component id

parameter.name: exchange_rate_info_id
parameter.description: the exchange rate information display component id

parameter.name: currency_info_id
parameter.description: the currency information display component id

parameter.name: historical_rates_id
parameter.description: the historical exchange rates display component id
